Name Description
[m]delimited-[]𝑚[m] The set of clients participating in AFL.

ξi,ξi,ksubscript𝜉𝑖subscript𝜉𝑖𝑘\xi_{i},\xi_{i,k} Local dataset at client i𝑖i and the training batch from ξisubscript𝜉𝑖\xi_{i} used in the k𝑘kth training epoch at client i𝑖i, respectively.
xtsubscript𝑥𝑡x_{t} Global model weights at iteration t𝑡t.
ηi,ksubscript𝜂𝑖𝑘\eta_{i,k} Local learning rate for k−t​h𝑘𝑡ℎk-th local epoch at client i𝑖i.
xt,Kisuperscriptsubscript𝑥𝑡𝐾𝑖x_{t,K}^{i} Local model parameters of client i𝑖i after K𝐾K epochs of local training starting from the global weights xtsubscript𝑥𝑡x_{t}.
τ𝜏\tau The lag of the locally available global weights to the current ones, τ≤t𝜏𝑡\tau\leq t.
Δi​(xt−τ,K)subscriptΔ𝑖subscript𝑥𝑡𝜏𝐾\Delta_{i}(x_{t-\tau,K}) Pseudo gradients by client i𝑖i with K𝐾K epochs local training started from the global weights xt−τsubscript𝑥𝑡𝜏x_{t-\tau}.
γ​(i,τ)𝛾𝑖𝜏\gamma(i,\tau) Staleness of Δi​(xt−τ,K)subscriptΔ𝑖subscript𝑥𝑡𝜏𝐾\Delta_{i}(x_{t-\tau,K}) with regards to the current version of global weight xtsubscript𝑥𝑡x_{t}.
ηg,isubscript𝜂𝑔𝑖\eta_{g,i} Global learning rate adaptively set for client i𝑖i.
λ,ε𝜆𝜀\lambda,\varepsilon Hyperparameters for adaptively setting ηgsubscript𝜂𝑔\eta_{g}.
Ki,nsubscript𝐾𝑖𝑛K_{i,n} The number of local epoch for client i𝑖i in its n−t​h𝑛𝑡ℎn-th local training.
γ¯¯𝛾\bar{\gamma} Hyperparameters for adaptively setting K𝐾K.
